description: This sweet and spicy salsa is a great addition to any dish.
keywords: Salsa,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Mango,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Chilli Mango Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium mango, peeled, de-seeded and chopped
1 small red onion, peeled and chopped
1 medium red capsicum, de-seeded and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Dice all the fruit and veg into small pieces.
Combine it all in a bowl and toss in the lime juice before serving.
